Gra jest fajna, pozostawia świetny klimat oraz ochotę rozegrania kolejnych za kolejnymi meczami. Minusem jest to że przy zakupie gry nie dostajemy wszystkich postaci zarówno potworów jak i ocalałych, tylko musimy kupić niektóre DLC (m.in. Krugera albo Mayersa). Gra nie co się różni od oglądania na youtube. Jest inaczej. Gra ma świetną grafikę, świetne udźwiękowienie. Jeśli ktoś oglądał filmiki u różnych osób to będzie wiedział jak się powinno grać i napewno będzie na wyższym poziomie niż reszta początkujących graczy. Gra jest przyjemna, oczywiście bez dodatków nie posiadamy takich potworów jak: doktor, Mike Mayers, Mark Kruger a także kilku uciekających. Postać można stworzyć pod siebie, jest wiele itemkow które możemy ulepszyć. Itemki możemy tracić (przy śmierci) albo wynosić (przy ucieczce bądź rozłączeniu się mordercy). Gra jest wciągająca. Warto wydać na promocji świątecznej 35.99 zł na tak świetną grę.
Polecam! :D

[spoiler]Топ

So far, so good. I've heard some nasty things about the late game in the ranking system, but I've just been playing for fun and bloodpoints. Lemme give you a hint for fun gameplay - go into this game as a "survivor" fully expecting to get sacrificed. But make the MFer *work* for his/her sacrifice. If you're the killer, try not to face camp. You'll get more points if you let players off the hook once in a while and go hunting for others. Regardless, this game is great fun, especially if you can talk a few friends into "surviving" with you.

Killerzy są stanowczo zbyt OP i nie można ich bezkarnie tea-bagować survivorami co jest karygodnym zachowaniem ze strony twórców!!! Mój kolega Pola nie może przez to grać w swoim ulubionym stylu przez co wystawia negatywną recenzję tak jak Ja to teraz robię. Bez poważania Patryg

Помойка полная, не играйте в этот мусор, заходите только если вы отбитый куколд или мазохист, худшая игра в мире, кроме негатива никаких эмоций не приностит. Если вы не играете в 4 пати за выживших, то вы в невыгодном положении, т.к. при игре за маньяка в 99% игр будете играть против людей в дискорде, а игра почему-то за 100000000000 лет не предложила хотя бы текстового внутриигрового чата. Вывод: за маньяка вы сосете от пати, за выжившего играете без чата, соответственно вы всегда в проигрыше. Разработчики не играют в свою игру, я который играл с перерывами с начала беты, не видел баланса в ней ни разу. Если хотите играть в игру, в которой разработчик только клепает скинчики, а баги являются неотъемлемой частью игры, то добро пожаловать, только рот от говна вытереть не забудьте после игрового сеанса.

O jogo é muito bom, não enjoa, mas tem um sistema de nível não muito bom, extremamente "grindy", ou seja, você precisa dedicar horas e horas ao jogo para chegar a algum lugar. O jogo fica muito melhor (e mais fácil) se você jogar com seus amigos! Só uma pequena observação: Dificilmente alguém entende o jogo logo quando começa a jogar. Eu diria que só é possível entender o jogo completamente depois de 200 ou mais horas de jogo.

Dead by Daylight это самая ужасная игра в мире. Мало того что мы получаем 20 фпс, так разрабы выпускают эту помойку на консоли, да еще в 4 раза дороже. Нет, чтобы оптимизировать игру, разрабы создают платные DLS. Комьюнити этой игры состоит из нытиков маньяков и сурвов даунов. Это 2 мой аккаунт с этой помойкой, так как на первом я отыграл 600 часов и получил вак не за что и с моим другом такакя же история. На днях моего друга забанили в третий раз, модераторы ведут себя как петухи и банят просто так. Когда маньяки начинают ныть, из-за того что их закрутили, они пишут разрабам и они все исправляют. Когда сурвы начинают ныть, что очень редко, они ловят дулю. Фейскемп это тактика игры. Разрабы, вы что, совсем идиоты? Как в эту помойку можно играть, если даже сурва спасти нельзя?! В игре присутствует очень много багов, которые еле фиксятся. Еще раз повторяю! Если у вас слабый ПК, никогда не покупайте эту игру, у вас не хватит нервов и из-за фейскемпов вы просто сгорите. И еще, если вы отсталый даун, то эта игра для вас.
Pls refound this game my Pc is to mutch low for it =(

ざっくり言うと1vs4のかくれんぼ鬼ごっこ。AIMがほとんど必要ないため経験と立ち回りで差が出るゲーム。
わたしみたいなぬるゲーマーの対戦好きにはピッタリ。
マイナス点としてはプレイヤーの民度が低い。
プレイスタイルは人それぞれなので構わないけど、某国の方がすぐ切断するので結構な割合でまともなゲームにならない。
LOLのように切断は自動判断でBANなどのペナルティがないため野放し状態なのが残念。

Краткое описание и оценки игры.
Игра "Dead By Daylight" появилась 14 июня 2016 года. В этой игре вы оббосыте все свои штаны, обосрётесь и скорее всего получите инфаркт от испуга который вы здесь увидите. К чему я всё это веду Behaviour Digital Inc. [BDI.] посторались на славу.
Графика 10/10
Геймплей 10/10
Хоррор 10/10
Тиммейты 8/10
Помощь вам 9/10

游戏性：3 / 5
主玩人类，其实现在看来也不过就是偷电贼大战农场主的单调故事，沉迷了100多小时进去，大概是因为每打一局之后都会感受到自己不一样的成长吧…
开始的时候自以为身法天旋地转，却被随意一刀砍翻；第一次捡到手电对着屠夫的屁股一顿照明，之后连吃两斧愉快上树，有大佬的勇气却没有大佬的技术，幸而有屠夫愿意扛我到地窖，我也感激地打出谢谢。
后来学会了怂，带着三级猫当机皇，修几下换一个地方，逃出升天的概率明显提高，但每局总要死那么一两个队友，瑟瑟发抖不敢去救。
再后来有了一点技术，在被屠夫追的时候也能偶尔遛一遛了，虽然技术还是很菜，但已经体验到单调外表下的丰富玩法，可以送快递，也可以溜屠夫，还可以在树上看大家玩耍×

画面：2 / 3
最精致的画面大概就是那一团篝火了，嗯…
至于人物建模，我只能说小作坊的审美还真是微妙呢(屠夫比人帅系列)。

音乐：2 / 2
这游戏，如果音乐声盖过了脚步声才是灾难…但是开始界面的音乐很赞，不论是经典款还是节日特惠款。

综合：7 / 10
某日，把一只执拗的小白妹扔到地道口，看到对面的“谢谢”，感觉思绪穿越回了曾经的自己，点出好技能是一段难熬的过程，关爱萌新[spoiler](包括我自己)[/spoiler]，人人有责。

Ich habe in diesem Spiel bisher mehr als 300 Stunden... Und es fesselt mich immernoch! Der Spielspaß  geht nicht so schnell verloren und es wird auch nicht langweilig. Aber es gibt zwei Nachteile....

1. Die community: Wenn man Survivor spielt, dann wird man sehr oft gecamped und getunnelt. Das verdirbt oft den spielspaß und die Laune.

2. Die Bugs: Die Devs sollten mal mehr gegen die Bugs machen, als irgendwelche Skins für echt-Geld hinzuzufügen....

UPDATED REVIEW - original review below this one.

Well, a viewer of my stream gifted me this game with the request that I try it again and give it another chance.  Despite being one of maybe 2 or 3 games that I've EVER returned on steam, I agreed.  I mean, why not if it's being gifted, right?

I still don't know if I would change my thumbs down to a thumbs up, because quite frankly I don't know if I'd flat out reccomend this game.  But I MIGHT depending on the person.  I think DBD fills a very specific niche.  Quite frankly when you play it with 4 other people and you're in voice chat laughing and joking and one of you is killing the other four, it's just a hell of a lot of fun.  But sadly that's not usually the case for most people.  

I think some of the issues that I mention in my original reply have gotten better, a little bit, but all of them are still there.  The game can still feel like lobby simulator.  The people you play with CAN be toxic and salty A.F.  The DLC heroes feel way more powerful then the base game, but not as bad as they were before multiple tweaks.  Basically everything negative I said in my original review still applies... it's just not quite as bad as it was before.

I've found myself enjoying the role of killer a lot, and have had quite a fun time playing as one, even if I do terribly in a match.  As long as you aren't a 'camper' people generally seem to be fairly non toxic, for the most part.  What brought about that change from 6 - 7 months ago?  I don't know, but it's noticible.

As of the time I'm writing this, they've made changes to the level up system, which means that the shrine of secrets, an important part of leveling up your characters, isn't currently in the game.  This makes it feel WAY less grindy since you don't need to try to hope for RNG and the right amount of exp to get character perks.  Unfortunately the trade off is that now you NEED to buy the DLC and level up other characters you want to get those perks.  So, you know, one step forwards, one step backwards.

/shrug

Listen, ultimately, I'm enjoying it a bit currently, but I just don't know if it's the right game for you, so I'll close with the same sentiment I had 7 months ago:

Save your time, save your money, and unless you have friends you are going to play this with, give this one a pass.



----------------------------
Original review below
----------------------------



There's no way I can reccomend this game, for a few reasons:

- the DLC money grab feels very blatant and intentional.  

All of the DLC heroes feel far more powerful then the base game heroes.  You can easily spend 2-3 times as much money on the DLC as you did for the base game, and that's not counting if you want the alternate outfits (which arguably ALSO grant an advantage over the base outfits)

- the matching system is terrible

First of all, as a streamer, it's pretty shitty to sit in a lobby and wait for people to try to join a game for upwards of 10 minutes.  Then depending on everyone's connection, you're sometimes staring at a loading screen for several more minutes.  I know that this is frustrating as a solo player, but as a streamer, it makes the game practically worthless to play on stream.

- Disconnects / quitters

So lets say you get into a game and the game begins loading.  Guess what happens.... frequently?  Someone disconnects, either because of lag or on purpose.  Then what?  Your loading screen just sits there for upwards of five minutes.  That's assuming other people don't force quit the game, which causes the loading screen to go on even longer.  Then when you finally get into the game, you're sometimes looking at a 3v1 scenario instead of 4v1.  Or god forbid a 2v1, which I've had happen twice in less than 4 hours owning the game.  There's pretty much no chance of the survivors winning in a 2v1 scenario.  So what happens?  The killer often ends up just farming the two remaining players, not letting them win, not letting them lose, for as long as it takes before one of them quits out of the game.  Why does he do that?  

- The game is VERY grindy.

As you play you earn experience (bloodshards).  You use these to rank up your survivors or your killers, but when you put BS into a character, that's it, it's just that ONE character.  So decide which killer or survivor you like, because you're going to be putting a LOT of points into them.   With only 3ish hours played, I couldn't tell you how much you need to 'max out' even a single character, but I can tell you that as I dumped all my points into one character to see how 'deep' i could go, I didn't even unlock the 2nd perk, which im told is rank 16.  It's is an absolutely ridiculous amount of grinding needed especially for new players.

- the level up system

 It's called a blood web, making you think you can choose your branch and specialize and pick your talents right?  NOPE.  you have to put ALL points into ALL nodes on each web before you can go to the next level.  it's ridiculous, especially since several of the points on the web are somewhat worthless one shot items.

- one shot items

Remember how i described how some matches are ridiculously unfair because of disconnects and because some killers are FAR more overpowered then others?  Well guess what?  BEFORE you queue into a game you can choose which items and boosts you want to use, but once you get into a game, boom, they're used up.  So if you only have one 'toolkit' left and you queue into a match that has 2 people leave / DC, guess what, that kit's going to be gone on a match you have no chance of winning.  GUESS YOU BETTER START GRINDING FOR MORE BLOOD SHARDS EH FRIEND?

- toxicity

This was a mixed bag.  About two thirds of my matches were actually pretty cool people.  After the game people were like GG or even said a little bit, which was really nice.  But of course that just points a glaring finger at the other third of the games I played where people were so toxic it was sad.  "Die in a fire noob killer" and the like.  Really?  How does that enhance the game play experience at all?  Also, in game, like I said, some killers will purposely proloung games as much as they can just to farm as much blood shard experience as possible.  One game the killer quite handily dispatched three of the survivors (he was using a DLC killer of course) and then would just rotate letting the one living guy pick up someone else, then knocking them down, letting the up person pick someone else up, knocking that down, etc etc etc.  Until people started leaving the game.  Not letting them get any objectives, just drawing out the game as much as possible to get the maximum amount of blood shards he could.

- bugs

Finally and this is a very minor point and one i didn't experience often in my short time playing it, but the game is buggy.  I clipped through walls, rubber banded, and found myself struggling with the terrain far more often then I should have considering my PC specs as well as how long this game has been out.  One time it even caused some sort of error where the ALT and the A key were perma pressed down, forcing my character into a permanant crouch shuffle to the left.  


Save your time, save your money, and unless you have 4 friends you are going to play this with, give this one a pass.
Taught me that I hate teamates even more than in CSGO
